official_title: A bill to prevent inequities in the administration of income determinations pertaining to low-rent housing.

summary.text: Revises the definition of "income" for purposes of determining eligibility for low-income housing under the Housing Act of 1937.

titles.title: A bill to prevent inequities in the administration of income determinations pertaining to low-rent housing.
